sentences.en: Click on the left sidebar to view my photo albums.
sentences.cn: 左边相册目录里面是我的全部相册,欢迎点击查看.

sentences.en: Create a page with a one - column body and a two - column sidebar on the right.
sentences.cn: 创建带有一栏正文、右边有两个边框的网页.

sentences.en: Do you see the categories listed in the sidebar now?
sentences.cn: 现在你能看到工具条里列的类别了 吗 ?

sentences.en: For more information, see the sidebar and Chapter 5: Merits.
sentences.cn: 获取更多信息, 请参加侧边栏和第五 章 长处.

sentences.en: For more reasons, click the links under Elsewhere on the Web in the sidebar.
sentences.cn: 需要更多信息, 请点击文末的连接.

sentences.en: I add on the left side the table or sidebar with option add custom links.
sentences.cn: 我还要在左侧或侧边选项中加入客户的链接.

sentences.en: Select the custom shapes tool from the sidebar menu.
sentences.cn: 选择工具栏上的“自定义形状工具”.

sentences.en: Small text box used to create a note or sidebar. Drag a selection handle to resize.
sentences.cn: 小文本框用于创建注释或边栏. 拖动选择手柄可调整大小.

sentences.en: Vertical photographs and graphics tend to fit well with the long vertical column of the sidebar.
sentences.cn: 竖直的图片和图形适合于长栏的边栏.

trans.tran_en: a separate part of something such as a newspaper article where extra information is given

trans.tran_cn: 工具栏，补充报道 ，（马鞍等的）横挡，花絮
